### 3. Je hebt een mooie glimlach

ÎˆÎ½Î± ÎºÎ¿Î¼Ï€Î»Î¹Î¼Î­Î½Ï„Î¿ Ï€Î¿Ï… Ï€Î¬Î½Ï„Î± ÎµÎºÏ„Î¹Î¼Î¬Ï„Î±Î¹.

## Î¡Î¿Î¼Î±Î½Ï„Î¹ÎºÎ­Ï‚ Î•ÎºÏ†ÏÎ¬ÏƒÎµÎ¹Ï‚

### 4. Ik kan niet stoppen met aan je te denken

Î“Î¹Î± ÎµÎºÎµÎ¯Î½ÎµÏ‚ Ï„Î¹Ï‚ ÏƒÏ„Î¹Î³Î¼Î­Ï‚ Ï€Î¿Ï… ÎºÎ¬Ï€Î¿Î¹Î¿Ï‚ ÎºÎ±Ï„Î±Î»Î±Î¼Î²Î¬Î½ÎµÎ¹ Ï„Î¹Ï‚ ÏƒÎºÎ­ÏˆÎµÎ¹Ï‚ ÏƒÎ±Ï‚.

### 5. Je bent de liefde van mijn leven

**Î£Î·Î¼Î±ÏƒÎ¯Î±:** Î•Î¯ÏƒÎ±Î¹ Î· Î±Î³Î¬Ï€Î· Ï„Î·Ï‚ Î¶Ï‰Î®Ï‚ Î¼Î¿Ï…

Î“Î¹Î± Ï€Î¿Î»Ï ÏƒÎ·Î¼Î±Î½Ï„Î¹ÎºÎ­Ï‚ Î´Î·Î»ÏÏƒÎµÎ¹Ï‚.

### 6. Je maakt me zo gelukkig

Î‘Ï€Î»Î® ÎºÎ±Î¹ Î²Î±Î¸Î¹Î¬.

## Î Î±Î¹Ï‡Î½Î¹Î´Î¹Î¬ÏÎ¹ÎºÎµÏ‚ Î¦ÏÎ¬ÏƒÎµÎ¹Ï‚

### 7. Kom hier, schat
**Î ÏÎ¿Ï†Î¿ÏÎ¬:** ÎšÎ¿Î¼ Ï‡Î¹Ï, ÏƒÏ‡Î±Ï„

**Î£Î·Î¼Î±ÏƒÎ¯Î±:** ÎˆÎ»Î± ÎµÎ´Ï, Î¸Î·ÏƒÎ±Ï…ÏÎ­ Î¼Î¿Ï…

Î¤Î¿ "schat" ÎµÎ¯Î½Î±Î¹ Ï€Î¿Î»Ï Î´Î·Î¼Î¿Ï†Î¹Î»Î­Ï‚ Ï…Ï€Î¿ÎºÎ¿ÏÎ¹ÏƒÏ„Î¹ÎºÏŒ.

### 8. Je bent onweerstaanbaar

**Î£Î·Î¼Î±ÏƒÎ¯Î±:** Î•Î¯ÏƒÎ±Î¹ Î±ÎºÎ±Ï„Î±Î¼Î¬Ï‡Î·Ï„Î¿Ï‚/Î·

Î”ÎµÎ¯Ï‡Î½ÎµÎ¹ ÏŒÏ„Î¹ Î´ÎµÎ½ Î¼Ï€Î¿ÏÎµÎ¯Ï„Îµ Î½Î± Î±Î½Ï„Î¹ÏƒÏ„Î±Î¸ÎµÎ¯Ï„Îµ.

### 9. Ik ben zo blij dat ik je heb

**Î£Î·Î¼Î±ÏƒÎ¯Î±:** Î§Î±Î¯ÏÎ¿Î¼Î±Î¹ Ï„ÏŒÏƒÎ¿ Ï€Î¿Ï… ÏƒÎµ Î­Ï‡Ï‰

Î•ÎºÏ†ÏÎ¬Î¶ÎµÎ¹ ÎµÏ…Î³Î½Ï‰Î¼Î¿ÏƒÏÎ½Î·.

## Î¤ÏÏ…Ï†ÎµÏÎ­Ï‚ Î£Ï„Î¹Î³Î¼Î­Ï‚

### 10. Je hebt mooie ogen
**Î ÏÎ¿Ï†Î¿ÏÎ¬:** Î“Î¹Îµ Ï‡ÎµÎ¼Ï€Ï„ Î¼ÏŒÎ¹Îµ ÏŒÏ‡ÎµÎ½

**Î£Î·Î¼Î±ÏƒÎ¯Î±:** ÎˆÏ‡ÎµÎ¹Ï‚ ÏŒÎ¼Î¿ÏÏ†Î± Î¼Î¬Ï„Î¹Î±

ÎšÎ»Î±ÏƒÎ¹ÎºÏŒ ÏÎ¿Î¼Î±Î½Ï„Î¹ÎºÏŒ ÎºÎ¿Î¼Ï€Î»Î¹Î¼Î­Î½Ï„Î¿.

### 11. Ik ben gek op je
**Î ÏÎ¿Ï†Î¿ÏÎ¬:** Î™Îº Î¼Ï€ÎµÎ½ Ï‡ÎµÎº Î¿Ï€ Î³Î¹Îµ

**Î£Î·Î¼Î±ÏƒÎ¯Î±:** Î•Î¯Î¼Î±Î¹ Ï„ÏÎµÎ»ÏŒÏ‚/Î® Î³Î¹Î± ÏƒÎ­Î½Î±

ÎˆÎ½Ï„Î¿Î½Î· Î­ÎºÏ†ÏÎ±ÏƒÎ· Ï€Î¬Î¸Î¿Ï…Ï‚.

### 12. Elke dag hou ik meer van je
**Î ÏÎ¿Ï†Î¿ÏÎ¬:** ÎˆÎ»ÎºÎµ Î½Ï„Î±Ï‡ Ï‡Î¬Î¿Ï… Î¹Îº Î¼ÎµÏ Ï†Î±Î½ Î³Î¹Îµ

**Î£Î·Î¼Î±ÏƒÎ¯Î±:** ÎšÎ¬Î¸Îµ Î¼Î­ÏÎ± ÏƒÎµ Î±Î³Î±Ï€Ï Ï€ÎµÏÎ¹ÏƒÏƒÏŒÏ„ÎµÏÎ¿

Î”ÎµÎ¯Ï‡Î½ÎµÎ¹ Î±Ï…Î¾Î±Î½ÏŒÎ¼ÎµÎ½Î· Î±Î³Î¬Ï€Î·.

## ÎŸÎ»Î»Î±Î½Î´Î¹ÎºÎ¬ Î¥Ï€Î¿ÎºÎ¿ÏÎ¹ÏƒÏ„Î¹ÎºÎ¬

- **Schat** (ÏƒÏ‡Î±Ï„) - Î˜Î·ÏƒÎ±Ï…ÏÏŒÏ‚
- **Lieverd** (Î»Î¯Ï†ÎµÏÎ½Ï„) - Î‘Î³Î±Ï€Î·Î¼Î­Î½Îµ/Î·
- **Liefje** (Î»Î¯Ï†Î³Î¹Îµ) - Î‘Î³Î¬Ï€Î· Î¼Î¿Ï…
- **Knuffel** (ÎºÎ½Î¯Ï†ÎµÎ») - Î‘Î³ÎºÎ±Î»Î¯Ï„ÏƒÎ±

## Î Î¿Î»Î¹Ï„Î¹ÏƒÏ„Î¹ÎºÎ­Ï‚ Î£Ï…Î¼Î²Î¿Ï…Î»Î­Ï‚

**Î•Î¹Î»Î¹ÎºÏÎ¯Î½ÎµÎ¹Î±:** ÎŸÎ¹ ÎŸÎ»Î»Î±Î½Î´Î¿Î¯ ÎµÎºÏ„Î¹Î¼Î¿ÏÎ½ Ï„Î·Î½ ÎµÏ…Î¸ÏÏ„Î·Ï„Î±. ÎœÎ·Î½ Ï…Ï€ÎµÏÎ²Î¬Î»Î»ÎµÏ„Îµ.

**Î‰Ï‡Î¿Ï‚ "g":** Î¤Î¿ Î¿Î»Î»Î±Î½Î´Î¹ÎºÏŒ "g" ÎµÎ¯Î½Î±Î¹ Î»Î±ÏÏ…Î³Î³Î¹ÎºÏŒ, ÏŒÏ€Ï‰Ï‚ Ï„Î¿ ÎµÎ»Î»Î·Î½Î¹ÎºÏŒ "Ï‡".

**Î§Î¹Î¿ÏÎ¼Î¿Ï:** Î¤Î¿ Ï‡Î¹Î¿ÏÎ¼Î¿Ï ÎµÎ¯Î½Î±Î¹ ÏƒÎ·Î¼Î±Î½Ï„Î¹ÎºÏŒ ÏƒÏ„Î·Î½ Î¿Î»Î»Î±Î½Î´Î¹ÎºÎ® ÎºÎ¿Ï…Î»Ï„Î¿ÏÏÎ±. ÎœÎ·Î½ Ï†Î¿Î²Î·Î¸ÎµÎ¯Ï„Îµ Î½Î± ÎµÎ¯ÏƒÏ„Îµ Ï€Î±Î¹Ï‡Î½Î¹Î´Î¹Î¬ÏÎ·Î´ÎµÏ‚.

ÎŸÎ¹ ÎŸÎ»Î»Î±Î½Î´Î¿Î¯ Î¼Ï€Î¿ÏÎµÎ¯ Î½Î± Ï†Î±Î¯Î½Î¿Î½Ï„Î±Î¹ Î±ÏÏ‡Î¹ÎºÎ¬ ÎµÏ€Î¹Ï†Ï…Î»Î±ÎºÏ„Î¹ÎºÎ¿Î¯, Î±Î»Î»Î¬ ÎµÎ¯Î½Î±Î¹ Ï€Î¿Î»Ï Ï„ÏÏ…Ï†ÎµÏÎ¿Î¯ Î¼Îµ Ï„Î¿Ï…Ï‚ Î±Î³Î±Ï€Î·Î¼Î­Î½Î¿Ï…Ï‚ Ï„Î¿Ï…Ï‚!

articles.title: Portuguese Phrases for Meeting the In-Laws: Make a Great Impression
articles.content:
Meeting your partner's Portuguese-speaking family is a warm milestone. Portuguese-speaking cultures value family deeply, and your effort to speak their language will earn you immediate affection.

## Why Language Matters

Family is central in Portuguese-speaking cultures. Speaking their language shows respect for their heritage and genuine commitment to becoming part of the family.

## First Impressions

### Greetings

**Ã‰ um prazer conhecÃª-los**
*It's a pleasure to meet you*

Warm, proper greeting.

**Ã‰ uma honra conhecer a famÃ­lia do/da [partner's name]**
*It's an honor to meet [partner's name]'s family*

Expresses genuine appreciation.

**[Partner's name] me falou muito sobre vocÃªs**
*[Partner's name] has told me so much about you*

Shows your partner values their family.

## Expressing Gratitude

**Obrigado/Obrigada por me receberem em sua casa**
*Thank you for welcoming me into your home*

Use *obrigado* if male, *obrigada* if female.

**EstÃ¡ delicioso!**
*It's delicious!*

Complimenting food is essential.

**Muito obrigado/obrigada por tudo**
*Thank you so much for everything*

Deep gratitude.

## Talking About Your Partner

**Amo muito o seu filho/a sua filha**
*I love your son/daughter very much*

Direct declaration of feelings.

**[Partner's name] Ã© uma pessoa maravilhosa**
*[Partner's name] is a wonderful person*

Complimenting how they raised their child.

**VocÃªs criaram uma pessoa incrÃ­vel**
*You've raised an incredible person*

Giving credit to parents.

**Ele/Ela me faz muito feliz**
*He/She makes me very happy*

Sharing your happiness.

## Polite Conversation

**Posso ajudar em alguma coisa?**
*Can I help with anything?*

Offering assistance.

**Pode me contar mais sobre [topic]?**
*Can you tell me more about [topic]?*

Showing interest.

**Que casa linda vocÃªs tÃªm!**
*What a beautiful home you have!*

Complimenting their home.

**A famÃ­lia tambÃ©m Ã© muito importante para mim**
*Family is also very important to me*

Aligning values.

## Discussing the Future

**Espero que possamos passar mais tempo juntos**
*I hope we can spend more time together*

Desire for continued relationship.

**Adoraria aprender mais sobre as suas tradiÃ§Ãµes**
*I would love to learn more about your traditions*

Cultural interest.

**Quero que saibam que minhas intenÃ§Ãµes sÃ£o sÃ©rias**
*I want you to know my intentions are serious*

For discussions about commitment.

## Saying Goodbye

**Foi um prazer conhecÃª-los**
*It was a pleasure to meet you*

Warm farewell.

**Espero vÃª-los em breve**
*I hope to see you soon*

Future meetings.

**Obrigado/Obrigada por me fazerem sentir bem-vindo/bem-vinda**
*Thank you for making me feel welcome*

## Cultural Tips (Brazil vs. Portugal)

**Brazilian Portuguese:**
- More informal, warm, and physically affectionate
- Expect hugs and cheek kisses
- *VocÃª* is standard for "you"

**European Portuguese:**
- More formal initially, use *o senhor/a senhora*
- Handshakes may come before embraces
- Tradition is highly valued

**Both cultures:**
- Food is centralâ€”always compliment and accept
- Family gatherings can be large and lively
- Show genuine interest in family stories

## Building Long-Term Relationships

**Considero vocÃªs como minha prÃ³pria famÃ­lia**
*I consider you as my own family*

Once relationships develop.

**SerÃ£o sempre bem-vindos em nossa casa**
*You will always be welcome in our home*

Your effort shows the heart that Portuguese-speaking families treasure.

articles.title: Ukrainische Liebesbrief-Phrasen fÃ¼r Deutsche
articles.content:
Ukrainische Liebesbriefe zeichnen sich durch Herzlichkeit und poetische Ausdrucksweise aus. Die Sprache hat viele zÃ¤rtliche Kosenamen.

## Anreden

### "ĞšĞ¾Ñ…Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ" / "ĞšĞ¾Ñ…Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¼Ñ–Ğ¹"

### "Ğ¡Ğ¾Ğ½ĞµÑ‡ĞºĞ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ”"
**Bedeutung:** Mein Sonnenschein

### "Ğ¡ĞµÑ€Ğ´ĞµĞ½ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ”"
**Bedeutung:** Mein Herzchen

## Einleitungen

### "ĞŸĞ¸ÑˆÑƒ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ–, Ñ‰Ğ¾Ğ± ÑĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸, ÑĞº ÑĞ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ Ñ Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ ĞºĞ¾Ñ…Ğ°Ñ"

### "ĞĞµĞ¼Ğ°Ñ” ÑĞ»Ñ–Ğ², Ñ‰Ğ¾Ğ± Ğ²Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğµ, Ñ‰Ğ¾ Ñ Ğ´Ğ¾ Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ²Ñ–Ğ´Ñ‡ÑƒĞ²Ğ°Ñ"
**Bedeutung:** Es gibt keine Worte, um auszudrÃ¼cken, was ich fÃ¼r dich empfinde

## AusdrÃ¼cke der Liebe

### "Ğ¢Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¹ĞºÑ€Ğ°Ñ‰Ğµ, Ñ‰Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾ÑÑ Ğ² Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ”Ğ¼Ñƒ Ğ¶Ğ¸Ñ‚Ñ‚Ñ–"
**Bedeutung:** Du bist das Beste, was in meinem Leben passiert ist

### "ĞœĞ¾Ñ” Ğ¶Ğ¸Ñ‚Ñ‚Ñ Ğ·Ğ¼Ñ–Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾ÑÑ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ·Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¶Ğ´Ğ¸ Ğ² Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ´ĞµĞ½ÑŒ, ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¸ Ñ Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ·ÑƒÑÑ‚Ñ€Ñ–Ğ²"
**Bedeutung:** Mein Leben hat sich fÃ¼r immer verÃ¤ndert an dem Tag, als ich dich traf

### "Ğ¯ Ğ·Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ñ…ÑƒÑÑÑ Ğ² Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ²ÑĞµ Ğ±Ñ–Ğ»ÑŒÑˆĞµ Ğ· ĞºĞ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ´Ğ½ĞµĞ¼"
**Bedeutung:** Ich verliebe mich jeden Tag mehr in dich

### "Ğ¢Ğ¸ Ğ¾ÑĞ²Ñ–Ñ‚Ğ»ÑÑ”Ñˆ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ” Ğ¶Ğ¸Ñ‚Ñ‚Ñ ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ñ”Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ÑÑƒÑ‚Ğ½Ñ–ÑÑ‚Ñ"
**Bedeutung:** Du erhellst mein Leben mit deiner Anwesenheit

### "Ğ— Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ Ñ Ğ·Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ·ÑƒĞ¼Ñ–Ğ², Ñ‰Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞµ ÑĞ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¶Ğ½Ñ” ĞºĞ¾Ñ…Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ"
**Bedeutung:** Mit dir habe ich verstanden, was wahre Liebe ist

## Zukunftsversprechen

### "ĞĞ±Ñ–Ñ†ÑÑ ĞºĞ¾Ñ…Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ±ĞµĞ·ÑƒĞ¼Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾"
**Bedeutung:** Ich verspreche, dich bedingungslos zu lieben

### "Ğ¥Ğ¾Ñ‡Ñƒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ· Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ Ğ²ÑĞµ Ğ¶Ğ¸Ñ‚Ñ‚Ñ"
**Bedeutung:** Ich mÃ¶chte mein ganzes Leben mit dir verbringen

### "ĞœĞ¾Ñ” ĞºĞ¾Ñ…Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ Ğ´Ğ¾ Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´Ğµ Ñ‚Ñ–Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¸ Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸"
**Bedeutung:** Meine Liebe zu dir wird nur wachsen

## AbschlÃ¼sse

### "ĞĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¶Ğ´Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ²Ñ–Ğ¹" / "ĞĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¶Ğ´Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ"
**Bedeutung:** FÃ¼r immer dein/deine

### "Ğ— ÑƒÑÑ–Ñ”Ñ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ”Ñ Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¾Ğ²'Ñ..."
**Bedeutung:** Mit all meiner Liebe...

### "Ğ¯ Ñ‚ĞµĞ±Ğµ ĞºĞ¾Ñ…Ğ°Ñ, ÑÑŒĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ñ– Ñ– Ğ·Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¶Ğ´Ğ¸"
**Bedeutung:** Ich liebe dich, heute und immer

## Kulturelle Hinweise

Die ukrainische Kultur schÃ¤tzt Herzlichkeit und aufrichtige GefÃ¼hle. Die vielen Diminutive zeigen besondere ZÃ¤rtlichkeit!

articles.title: 30 Compliments en Russe pour Votre Partenaire
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Les Russes adorent les compliments expressifs et poÃ©tiques. Voici comment charmer votre partenaire avec les mots justes.

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Ğ¢Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ½Ğ° ĞºĞ°Ğº Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑĞ²ĞµÑ‚"
  translation="Tu es belle comme l'aube"
  pronunciation="ty prÃ©-KRAS-na kak ras-SVYÃ‰T"
  context="Un compliment poÃ©tique typiquement russe."
/>

## Compliments sur l'apparence

### Pour une femme

<VocabCard
  word="Ğ¢Ñ‹ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ°Ñ ĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ñ"

/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ğ¢Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ½Ğ°"

/>

<VocabCard

/>

<VocabCard

### Pour un homme

<VocabCard

/>

/>

<VocabCard

<VocabCard
  word="Ğ¢ĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ½ÑŒ Ğ¸Ğ´Ñ‘Ñ‚ ÑÑ‚Ğ° Ñ€ÑƒĞ±Ğ°ÑˆĞºĞ°"
  translation="Cette chemise te va trÃ¨s bien"
  pronunciation="ti-BYÃ‰ O-tchÃ©n' i-DYOT Ã‰-ta rou-BACH-ka"

/>

<CultureTip title="L'importance des compliments" flag="ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º">
En Russie, faire des compliments est un art. Les hommes sont attendus Ã  complimenter rÃ©guliÃ¨rement leur partenaire, surtout sur son apparence. Les compliments poÃ©tiques et expressifs sont trÃ¨s apprÃ©ciÃ©s - plus c'est Ã©laborÃ©, mieux c'est !
</CultureTip>

## Compliments sur la personnalitÃ©

<VocabCard
  word="Ğ¢Ñ‹ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ½ÑŒ ÑƒĞ¼Ğ½Ğ°Ñ"

## Compliments du quotidien

| Russe | Prononciation | FranÃ§ais |
|-------|---------------|----------|
| **ĞšĞ°Ğº Ğ²ĞºÑƒÑĞ½Ğ¾!** | kak FKOUS-na | Comme c'est bon ! |
| **Ğ¢Ñ‹ Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ÑˆĞ°Ñ Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ·ÑĞ¹ĞºĞ°** | ty LOUT-cha-ya kha-ZYAÃ¯-ka | Tu es la meilleure maÃ®tresse de maison |
| **Ğ¡Ğ¿Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ±Ğ¾, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ñ‹ ĞµÑÑ‚ÑŒ** | spa-SI-ba chto ty yÃ©st' | Merci d'exister |

| **Ğ¢Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°ĞµÑˆÑŒ Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºÑ‚Ğ¾** | ty pa-ni-MA-yÃ©ch mi-NYA kak nik-TO | Tu me comprends comme personne |

## Compliments poÃ©tiques

<CultureTip title="Les superlatifs russes" flag="ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º">
Les Russes adorent les superlatifs ! Â« Ğ¡Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ ĞºÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ñ Â» (la plus belle), Â« ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ÑˆĞ¸Ğ¹ Â» (le meilleur). N'hÃ©sitez pas Ã  exagÃ©rer un peu - c'est le style russe et votre partenaire apprÃ©ciera cette expressivitÃ©.
</CultureTip>

## RÃ©ponses aux compliments

## Phrases bonus
